EmailTemplate.description: Email to send when Additional Information is required for a Case
EmailTemplate.name: Additional Information has been requested
EmailTemplate.subject: Additional Information Request {CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In considering the Application and Reply, it appears that there is some further information which, if available, may well assist the Merit Reviewer in making the decision.
Please follow this link to review the request {CaseLink} If you have any queries, please contact mrs@sira.nsw.gov.au or call us on 02 9284 2284. Yours sincerely Merit Review Service
